alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Weber... southeastern Cache...west central Rich and northwestern Morgan Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 200 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morgan, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgan, Huntsville, Nordic Valley, Mountain Green, Causey Reservoir, Pineview Reservoir, Eden, Powder Mountain, Stoddard, Peterson, Snowbasin and Liberty. This includes Interstate 84 between mile markers 90 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
